name: VANARAI
briefDescription: Vanarai was registered by Dr. Mohan Dharia in the year 1986.We have been working since last 10 years in collaboration with Corporate Sector for Sustainable Rural Development. Corporate Companies like HUL, Cipla, ITC, Cummins India, HSBC, CTR, UPS,20 Cubes, Asian Paints, Atlas Copco, Desai Brothers, etc. We are PIA for 4 watershed development projects under the Vasundhara Program of GoM in 52 villages. We have been working in more than 250 villages and improved lives of at least  1 lac families. Daily production of milk increased from 200 ltrs to 12000 ltrs in Gawadewadi inducing Reverse Migration.165 families have returned back to their native village from slums in cities. Reverse migration has been achieved in 3 more villages.
